.. PearOS documentation apps file, created by IAJ

.. _apps:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
   

Apps
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

PearOS has custom apps, that are bundled with the OS by default

Pafari
==================

Pafari is the new (in development) default browser for PearOS, based on Chromium

For more info go to :ref:`Pafari <pafari>`


PearDrop
==================

PearDrop is the connection app that links your android device to your PearOS device.

For more info go to :ref:`PearDrop <peardrop>`
